title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2016 - St. Gallen, Switzerland
description:
It's the second time, we are running GDCR in St. Gallen! 
Our hosts, as per tradition, is the friendliest and coolest IT shop in town: Namics AG (http://www.namics.com/namics/standorte/zuerich/). 
Registration is open on Eventbrite (GDCR 16 St. Gallen) (https://www.eventbrite.com/e/global-day-of-coderetreat-2016-st-gallen-tickets-27274523835) 
Also, check out the GDCR events in Bern and Zürich as well, you may need to travel less!
